Exaggerate: The claim made by Donald Trump that he is "beating (Kelly Ayotte) in the polls by a lot" is an exaggeration. The expert's analysis of the polling data shows that Ayotte is actually tied with her Democratic opponent in the Senate race.
Lack enough support: Trump did not provide specific polls or any source material to support his claim. The expert's analysis had to rely on existing polling averages to evaluate the accuracy of Trump's statement.
Contradict fact: The expert's analysis contradicts Trump's claim by showing that Ayotte is not only not being beaten by Trump in the polls, but she is actually performing better than him in New Hampshire.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
Problematic assumption: There is no evidence of problematic assumption bias in this claim.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no evidence of alternative explanation bias in this claim.
